Open Source CLI Tool

RugbyClaw: Rugby Scores
in Your Terminal

Works out of the box ‚Äî no setup required. Track live scores, fixtures, and results for Top 14, Premiership, Six Nations, and 10+ more competitions. Standalone CLI or AI assistant integration.

npm install -g rugbyclaw
Get Started ‚Üí
Terminal 
$ rugbyclaw scores

OpenClaw AI Skill

OpenClaw + Rugby = RugbyClaw

The official OpenClaw rugby skill. Once installed, just ask your AI assistant about scores, fixtures, and results ‚Äî it handles the rest.

openclaw skill add rugbyclaw
"What's the score in the Toulouse game?"
Stade Toulousain 24 - 17 Racing 92 (67' ‚Äî LIVE)
"When does Toulouse play next?"
Saturday Feb 14 at 15:00 vs Stade Fran√ßais
"How did Racing do this weekend?"
Lost to Toulouse 17-24 away. Tough match.
"Top 14 fixtures this week"
Lists all upcoming matches with times and venues

Don't have OpenClaw? Get it here ‚Äî it's open source.

Everything a rugby fan needs

Built for fans who live and breathe the game.

Live Scores

Real-time scores and match updates. Follow games as they happen with minute-by-minute tracking.

Fixtures & Results

Upcoming matches and recent results across all major leagues. Never miss a game.

Team Tracking

Follow your favorite teams. Get their next match, last result, and full schedule.

Notifications

Match day reminders, score alerts, and weekly digests. Stay informed automatically.

Calendar Export

Export matches to your calendar with one command. ICS format works everywhere.

Real-time Updates

Follow mode shows live score updates in your terminal. No refresh needed.

Results with character

Nobody wants boring score alerts. RugbyClaw knows how you feel.

Big Win
Toulouse 38 - 12 Racing
"Absolute clinic. That wasn't a match, that was a statement. üî•"
Nail-biter
Toulouse 24 - 22 Racing
"Heart attack rugby. Clenched the whole second half but got it done."
Tough Loss
Toulouse 10 - 42 Leinster
"Let's not talk about it. Pain. Moving on."

Get started in 30 seconds

Works immediately after install ‚Äî no configuration required

1

Install the CLI

npm install -g rugbyclaw
2

Start using it

rugbyclaw scores

Default leagues: Top 14, Premiership, URC, Champions Cup, Six Nations

Optional

Customize (optional)

rugbyclaw config

Add your own API key for unlimited requests & custom leagues

Command reference

rugbyclaw scores Live and today's matches
rugbyclaw fixtures [league] Upcoming matches
rugbyclaw results [league] Recent results
rugbyclaw team <name> next Next match for a team
rugbyclaw team <name> last Last result for a team
rugbyclaw standings [league] League table
rugbyclaw calendar <match> Export to ICS
rugbyclaw config Setup wizard

All commands support --json for machine-readable output

RugbyClaw
GitHub npm Twitter Data: API-Sports
